precondition: No windows or dialog boxes are open on the desktop.
action: Right Click on the desktop to open the context menu.
expected_results: A context menu will appear, displaying options such as "Arrange Icons By", "Refresh", "Paste", "New", and "Properties".

precondition: The context menu with the title bar is open and the "Properties" option is visible.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will open and the context menu will disappear.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab selected.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow on the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screen saver options will appear, including "None," "3D FlowerBox," "3D Flying Objects," and others.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click on the "Screen saver" dropdown menu and select "3D Flipper".
expected_results: The "Settings" button below the "Screen saver" dropdown menu will become enabled.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Monitor power" section should be visible.
action: Click the "Power..." button within the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open, covering the "Display Properties" window. The new window will display tabs for "Power Schemes," "Advanced," "Hibernate," and "UPS", with the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme selected by default.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is currently active.
action: Click the dropdown button next to the "Turn off monitor:" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with a list of time interval options for the monitor to automatically turn off.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" item in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will close. The "Turn off monitor" setting will be set to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab active.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the "Display Properties" window.
